description.sun-moon:
The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
description.sword-shield:
The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
